newsitem.title: GERMANY: Adidas says plans ADR listing in U.S..
newsitem.headline: Adidas says plans ADR listing in U.S..

text.p: German sportswear manufacturer Adidas AG said on Tuesday it hoped to list American Depositary Receipts (ADRs) on the U.S. stock market.
A spokesman said the company had not fixed a timetable for the ADR launch, but said it could occur in the second half of 1998.
The Boersen-Zeitung newspaper had cited Adidas chief executive Robert Louis-Dreyfus as saying the company was planning an ADR launch soon.
